rooms.description: A spacious entry with a modern design, incorporating Vastu principles by ensuring proper entry flow.
Open-plan living area with contemporary decor, central courtyard view for natural lighting and ventilation.
Dining space integrated within the living room to maximize social interaction while adhering to Vastu's alignment of east for positive energy.
Modern kitchen layout with functional storage and ventilation, positioned according to local building norms.
A dedicated study area designed for both work and leisure, placed in a quiet corner as per Vastu guidelines.
Guest bathroom with contemporary fixtures and privacy ensured through effective spatial planning.

openings.description: North facing entrance to welcome auspicious energy, in line with Vastu principles.
Service entrance for staff and utilities positioned optimally.
Access point to the central courtyard, ensuring connectivity with natural light throughout the villa.
